title: Goliath frog

==Useful Info==
'''Goliath frogs''' are [[acid]]ic amphibians that attack from [[reaching|two tiles away]], possibly [[corrode|corroding]] you. They are found primarily in the [[Swamp]].

==Tips & Tricks==
*A source of [[corrosion resistance]] is helpful, though you need not keep it on after killing the frogs -- you are unlikely to encounter other sources of acid damage in the Swamp.
*Unlike most other threats in the Swamp, these frogs are not resistant to [[poison]]. [[Curare]] [[dart]]s or [[Mephitic Cloud]] work well to slow them down.

==Trivia==
Much like real-life [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Goliath_frog goliath frogs], Dungeon Crawl's goliath frogs lack vocal cords and are silent.

==History==
*Goliath frogs were added in [[0.26]].
